mapper.select: SELECT EZC_RESERV_ROOM.RESERV_ROOM_NUM AS reservRoomNum /* 예약 객실 번호, NUMBER(0,22) */ ,EZC_RESERV_ROOM.RESERV_NUM AS reservNum /* 예약 번호, NUMBER(0,22) */ ,EZC_RESERV_ROOM.PARTNER_ROOM_ORDER_NUM AS partnerRoomOrderNum /* 제휴사 객실 주문 번호, VARCHAR2(100) */ ,EZC_RESERV_ROOM.PARTNER_ROOM_GOODS_CD AS partnerRoomGoodsCd /* 제휴사 객실 상품 코드, VARCHAR2(100) */ ,EZC_RESERV_ROOM.ROOM_NM AS roomNm /* 객실 명, VARCHAR2(100) */ ,EZC_RESERV_ROOM.CHECK_IN_DD AS checkInDd /* 체크인 일자, VARCHAR2(8) */ ,EZC_RESERV_ROOM.CHECK_OUT_DD AS checkOutDd /* 체크아웃 일자, VARCHAR2(8) */ ,EZC_RESERV_ROOM.ADT_CNT AS adtCnt /* 성인 수, NUMBER(0,22) */ ,EZC_RESERV_ROOM.CHILD_CNT AS childCnt /* 소아 수, NUMBER(0,22) */ ,EZC_RESERV_ROOM.ROOM_CNT AS roomCnt /* 객실 수, NUMBER(0,22) */ ,EZC_RESERV_ROOM.NORMAL_AMT AS normalAmt /* 정상 금액, NUMBER(0,22) */ ,EZC_RESERV_ROOM.OPT_AMT AS optAmt /* 옵션 금액, NUMBER(0,22) */ ,EZC_RESERV_ROOM.SALE_AMT AS saleAmt /* 판매 금액, NUMBER(0,22) */ ,EZC_RESERV_ROOM.STD_USER AS stdUser /* 기준 인원, NUMBER(0,22) */ ,EZC_RESERV_ROOM.MAX_USER AS maxUser /* 최대 인원, NUMBER(0,22) */ ,EZC_RESERV_ROOM.BED_TYPE AS bedType /* 침대 유형, VARCHAR2(8) */ ,EZC_RESERV_ROOM.BREAKFAST_INCLUDE_YN AS breakfastIncludeYn /* 조식 포함 여부, CHAR(1) */ ,EZC_RESERV_ROOM.CANCEL_FEE_RULE AS cancelFeeRule /* 취소 수수료 규정, VARCHAR2(4000) */ ,EZC_RESERV_ROOM.ROOM_STATUS AS roomStatus /* 객실 상태, VARCHAR2(8) */ ,EZC_RESERV_ROOM.REG_ID AS regId /* 등록자 ID, VARCHAR2(20) */ ,EZC_RESERV_ROOM.REG_DT AS regDt /* 등록 일시, VARCHAR2(14) */ ,EZC_RESERV_ROOM.MODI_ID AS modiId /* 수정자 ID, VARCHAR2(20) */ ,EZC_RESERV_ROOM.MODI_DT AS modiDt /* 수정 일시, VARCHAR2(14) */ ,EZC_RESERV_ROOM.DIST_ROOM_CD AS distRoomCd /* 직영/숙박 객실 코드, NUMBER(0,22) */ FROM EZC_RESERV_ROOM /* 예약 객실 정보 */ WHERE 1=1 AND EZC_RESERV_ROOM.RESERV_ROOM_NUM = #{reservRoomNum, jdbcType=DECIMAL} /* 예약 객실 번호, NUMBER(0,22) */

SELECT COUNT(1) FROM EZC_RESERV_ROOM /* 예약 객실 정보 */ WHERE 1=1
AND EZC_RESERV_ROOM.RESERV_ROOM_NUM = #{reservRoomNum, jdbcType=DECIMAL} /* 예약 객실 번호, NUMBER(0,22) */
AND EZC_RESERV_ROOM.RESERV_NUM = #{reservNum, jdbcType=DECIMAL} /* 예약 번호, NUMBER(0,22) */
AND EZC_RESERV_ROOM.CANCEL_FEE_RULE LIKE '%' || #{cancelFeeRule, jdbcType=VARCHAR} || '%' /* 취소 수수료 규정, VARCHAR2(4000) */

SELECT * FROM ( SELECT ROWNUM AS ROW__NUM, RECORDS.* FROM ( /* #### SQL Body [[ ################# */ SELECT EZC_RESERV_ROOM.RESERV_ROOM_NUM AS reservRoomNum /* 예약 객실 번호, NUMBER(0,22) */ ,EZC_RESERV_ROOM.RESERV_NUM AS reservNum /* 예약 번호, NUMBER(0,22) */ ,EZC_RESERV_ROOM.PARTNER_ROOM_ORDER_NUM AS partnerRoomOrderNum /* 제휴사 객실 주문 번호, VARCHAR2(100) */ ,EZC_RESERV_ROOM.PARTNER_ROOM_GOODS_CD AS partnerRoomGoodsCd /* 제휴사 객실 상품 코드, VARCHAR2(100) */ ,EZC_RESERV_ROOM.ROOM_NM AS roomNm /* 객실 명, VARCHAR2(100) */ ,EZC_RESERV_ROOM.CHECK_IN_DD AS checkInDd /* 체크인 일자, VARCHAR2(8) */ ,EZC_RESERV_ROOM.CHECK_OUT_DD AS checkOutDd /* 체크아웃 일자, VARCHAR2(8) */ ,EZC_RESERV_ROOM.ADT_CNT AS adtCnt /* 성인 수, NUMBER(0,22) */ ,EZC_RESERV_ROOM.CHILD_CNT AS childCnt /* 소아 수, NUMBER(0,22) */ ,EZC_RESERV_ROOM.ROOM_CNT AS roomCnt /* 객실 수, NUMBER(0,22) */ ,EZC_RESERV_ROOM.NORMAL_AMT AS normalAmt /* 정상 금액, NUMBER(0,22) */ ,EZC_RESERV_ROOM.OPT_AMT AS optAmt /* 옵션 금액, NUMBER(0,22) */ ,EZC_RESERV_ROOM.SALE_AMT AS saleAmt /* 판매 금액, NUMBER(0,22) */ ,EZC_RESERV_ROOM.STD_USER AS stdUser /* 기준 인원, NUMBER(0,22) */ ,EZC_RESERV_ROOM.MAX_USER AS maxUser /* 최대 인원, NUMBER(0,22) */ ,EZC_RESERV_ROOM.BED_TYPE AS bedType /* 침대 유형, VARCHAR2(8) */ ,EZC_RESERV_ROOM.BREAKFAST_INCLUDE_YN AS breakfastIncludeYn /* 조식 포함 여부, CHAR(1) */ ,EZC_RESERV_ROOM.CANCEL_FEE_RULE AS cancelFeeRule /* 취소 수수료 규정, VARCHAR2(4000) */ ,EZC_RESERV_ROOM.ROOM_STATUS AS roomStatus /* 객실 상태, VARCHAR2(8) */ ,EZC_RESERV_ROOM.REG_ID AS regId /* 등록자 ID, VARCHAR2(20) */ ,EZC_RESERV_ROOM.REG_DT AS regDt /* 등록 일시, VARCHAR2(14) */ ,EZC_RESERV_ROOM.MODI_ID AS modiId /* 수정자 ID, VARCHAR2(20) */ ,EZC_RESERV_ROOM.MODI_DT AS modiDt /* 수정 일시, VARCHAR2(14) */ ,EZC_RESERV_ROOM.DIST_ROOM_CD AS distRoomCd /* 직영/숙박 객실 코드, NUMBER(0,22) */ FROM EZC_RESERV_ROOM /* 예약 객실 정보 */ WHERE 1=1
AND EZC_RESERV_ROOM.RESERV_ROOM_NUM = #{param.reservRoomNum, jdbcType=DECIMAL} /* 예약 객실 번호, NUMBER(0,22) */
AND EZC_RESERV_ROOM.RESERV_NUM = #{param.reservNum, jdbcType=DECIMAL} /* 예약 번호, NUMBER(0,22) */
AND EZC_RESERV_ROOM.CANCEL_FEE_RULE LIKE '%' || #{param.cancelFeeRule, jdbcType=VARCHAR} || '%' /* 취소 수수료 규정, VARCHAR2(4000) */
ORDER BY EZC_RESERV_ROOM.RESERV_ROOM_NUM DESC /* #### SQL Body ]] ################# */ ) RECORDS WHERE ROWNUM <= ((#{param.pageNum, jdbcType=NUMERIC}*#{param.pageCount, jdbcType=NUMERIC})+1) ) WHERE ROW__NUM > (#{param.pageNum, jdbcType=NUMERIC}-1)*#{param.pageCount, jdbcType=NUMERIC}
mapper.update: UPDATE EZC_RESERV_ROOM SET /* 예약 객실 정보 */ RESERV_NUM = #{reservNum, jdbcType=DECIMAL} /* 예약 번호, NUMBER(0,22) */ ,PARTNER_ROOM_ORDER_NUM = #{partnerRoomOrderNum, jdbcType=VARCHAR} /* 제휴사 객실 주문 번호, VARCHAR2(100) */ ,PARTNER_ROOM_GOODS_CD = #{partnerRoomGoodsCd, jdbcType=VARCHAR} /* 제휴사 객실 상품 코드, VARCHAR2(100) */ ,ROOM_NM = #{roomNm, jdbcType=VARCHAR} /* 객실 명, VARCHAR2(100) */ ,CHECK_IN_DD = #{checkInDd, jdbcType=VARCHAR} /* 체크인 일자, VARCHAR2(8) */ ,CHECK_OUT_DD = #{checkOutDd, jdbcType=VARCHAR} /* 체크아웃 일자, VARCHAR2(8) */ ,ADT_CNT = #{adtCnt, jdbcType=NUMERIC} /* 성인 수, NUMBER(0,22) */ ,CHILD_CNT = #{childCnt, jdbcType=NUMERIC} /* 소아 수, NUMBER(0,22) */ ,ROOM_CNT = #{roomCnt, jdbcType=NUMERIC} /* 객실 수, NUMBER(0,22) */ ,NORMAL_AMT = #{normalAmt, jdbcType=NUMERIC} /* 정상 금액, NUMBER(0,22) */ ,OPT_AMT = #{optAmt, jdbcType=NUMERIC} /* 옵션 금액, NUMBER(0,22) */ ,SALE_AMT = #{saleAmt, jdbcType=NUMERIC} /* 판매 금액, NUMBER(0,22) */ ,STD_USER = #{stdUser, jdbcType=NUMERIC} /* 기준 인원, NUMBER(0,22) */ ,MAX_USER = #{maxUser, jdbcType=NUMERIC} /* 최대 인원, NUMBER(0,22) */ ,BED_TYPE = #{bedType, jdbcType=VARCHAR} /* 침대 유형, VARCHAR2(8) */ ,BREAKFAST_INCLUDE_YN = #{breakfastIncludeYn, jdbcType=CHAR} /* 조식 포함 여부, CHAR(1) */ ,CANCEL_FEE_RULE = #{cancelFeeRule, jdbcType=VARCHAR} /* 취소 수수료 규정, VARCHAR2(4000) */ ,ROOM_STATUS = #{roomStatus, jdbcType=VARCHAR} /* 객실 상태, VARCHAR2(8) */ ,MODI_ID = #{modiId, jdbcType=VARCHAR} /* 수정자 ID, VARCHAR2(20) */ ,MODI_DT = #{modiDt, jdbcType=VARCHAR} /* 수정 일시, VARCHAR2(14) */ ,DIST_ROOM_CD = #{distRoomCd, jdbcType=DECIMAL} /* 직영/숙박 객실 코드, NUMBER(0,22) */ WHERE 1=1 AND RESERV_ROOM_NUM = #{reservRoomNum, jdbcType=DECIMAL} /* 예약 객실 번호, NUMBER(0,22) */
mapper.delete: DELETE FROM EZC_RESERV_ROOM /* 예약 객실 정보 */ WHERE 1=1 AND RESERV_ROOM_NUM = #{reservRoomNum, jdbcType=DECIMAL} /* 예약 객실 번호, NUMBER(0,22) */
